attributes.action: Find Parliament in contempt of the people and call an election.
attributes.additional_details:
I am a proud Britishman and the British people are my family, so when my family is under a possible threat, I see it as my duty to protect these beautiful Isles from without and within.
I ask you, my fellow family members, who call these islands our home to help win this struggle before it truly spirals out of control.

This transcends Brexit, this is about our historic democracy being destroyed by those that now refuse to hear our voice in an election or downright despise us because we disagree with them.

Please, I beg you, sign this petition and save our home.
attributes.background:
I won't waste time telling you what you most likely already know.
Our democracy has been infected with dangerous anti-democrats, the likes of which our beloved country hasn't seen since Charles the first.

Labour, The LibDems, The SNP, The Green Party, Plaid Cymru.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by finding Parliament in contempt. 
	
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
